explanation:
code_hardening: Added final modifiers to local variables vals1, vals2, and diff exactly as specified, without introducing any new validation or null checks so behavior remains unchanged.
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the method from versionCompare to compareVersion and defined it as a public static method suitable for the existing VersionCompare utility class; no additional type or import fixes were required.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Wrapped the final return statement that compares array lengths in an explicit else block, preserving the original comparison algorithm and outcome.
refactoring: Refactored the method name for clarity and consistency and made a minor structural refactor by adding the else block without altering control flow or results.
misc: Updated the Javadoc formatting, rephrased and relocated the note about "1.10" vs "1.10.0", and included a reference link to the originating Stack Overflow discussion; no new custom API calls were introduced (none).
